apple_vendor_description: This affectionate emoji on Apple devices depicts two individuals sharing a tender kiss, with one person having a medium skin tone and the other a medium-light skin tone, both rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and glossy 3D shading. Their soft, rounded features and the subtle blush on their cheeks convey a sense of romance and intimacy. It's an expressive way to communicate love, affection, or a romantic greeting between two people.
